PHPViewWidgets\Widgets
namespace
PHPViewWidgets\Widgets
PHPViewWidgets\Widgets\UIMeta

This class represents a meta widget, it IS NOT a container widget.

Information
Extends

PHPViewWidgets\Widgets\UIWidget

Options

This widget accepts the follwoing options:

name

The name attribute.

content

The content attribute.

http_equiv

An optional http-equiv attribute

charset

An optional charset attribute

other

An attribute to added verbatium
